message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $12000. It's a great deal and I'm sure you'll find it very valuable. Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $10000 for it. I hope this revised offer is acceptable.

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $10000 just isn't enough for me to let go of this product. It's truly unique and offers a lot of value. How about we split the difference and settle on $11000?  I'm confident you won't regret it.

Thank you for your response, Alice. I understand the value of the product, but I must stick to my budget. I am willing to offer $10500 for it. I hope this revised offer is closer to what you're looking for.
